item.description: Mr. Musk, one of President Trump’s main advisers, has not outlined a plan to reverse falling sales at the electric car company of which he is chief ex...

item.title: Trump Team Plans Cuts at HUD Office That Funds Disaster Recovery
item.description: Staff at the office, a branch of the U.S. housing department that Congress uses to address the worst catastrophes, would be reduced by 84 percent.

item.title: Germany’s Far-Right Comeback
item.description: Germany’s attempts to “remember away” its Nazi past has instead paved the way for an extremist resurgence.

item.title: Luis Rubiales Found Guilty of Sexual Assault for Kissing Jennifer Hermoso
item.description: Luis Rubiales forcibly kissed Jennifer Hermoso on the lips after the country’s national team won the 2023 Women’s World Cup.
